docs.abstract: An economist asks why pro-family voices do not offer more support for public spending to benefit parents and children.
docs.snippet: An economist asks why pro-family voices do not offer more support for public spending to benefit parents and children.

docs.lead_paragraph: In a siege that lasted nearly two weeks, forces of Somalia’s semiautonomous Puntland region raided a hijacked ship Sunday and rescued 22 hostages, Puntland authorities said.

headline.seo: 22 Hostages Held for Nearly 3 Years on Hijacked Ship Are Rescued
headline.main: 22 Hostages on Hijacked Ship Are Rescued in Somalia
headline.print_headline: 22 Hostages on Hijacked Ship Are Rescued in Somalia

docs.abstract: Forces of Somalia's semi-autonomous Puntland region raid hijacked ship in nearly two-week siege and safely rescue 23 hostages who had been held captive for nearly three years.
docs.snippet: In a siege that lasted nearly two weeks, forces of Somalia’s semiautonomous Puntland region raided a hijacked ship Sunday and rescued 22 hostages, Puntland authorities said.

docs.lead_paragraph: As chief nursing officer at the Veterans Administration, Ms. Ferguson fought to win better opportunities and more respect for nurses.

headline.seo: Vernice D. Ferguson, Leader and Advocate of Nurses, Dies at 84
headline.main: Vernice D. Ferguson, Leader and Advocate of Nurses, Dies at 84
headline.print_headline: Vernice D. Ferguson, 84; Led and Championed Nurses

docs.abstract: Vernice D Ferguson, longtime chief nursing officer at the Veterans Administration, dies at age 84.
docs.snippet: As chief nursing officer at the Veterans Administration, Ms. Ferguson fought to win better opportunities and more respect for nurses.
